thread.title: China's Xiaomi unveils its first India made phone
thread.title_full: China's Xiaomi unveils its first India made phone - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: China's Xiaomi unveils its first India made phone
text: Visakhapatnam, Aug 11 (ANI): Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh, N Chandrababu Naidu, launched the first phone manufactured in India by Chinese smartphone maker, Xiaomi Inc, in the coastal city of Visakhapatnam. The new smartphone, called Redmi 2 Prime, an India-specific upgrade to its best-selling Redmi2 budget smartphone, is priced at 6,999 rupees ($109.11). Redmi 2 Prime has been manufactured at Xiaomis manufacturing plant in Andhra Pradesh. The factory is a fillip for Prime Minister Narendra Modi , who has championed a campaign, Make in India, to turn India into a manufacturing powerhouse to boost economic growth and create much-needed employment. Speaking at the launch, Naidu said that the state will provide a single-window clearance to the Chinese smartphone maker. »
